com.snap2d.gl.opengl

Class GLProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snap2d.gl.opengl.GLProgram

extends Object
    Class representing a GLSL program object.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

        public GLProgram()

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentProgram

        public static GLProgram getCurrentProgram()
        Get the currently set shader program. Note that this works ONLY with programs created and enabled via GLProgram.
        Returns:
        the current shader program or null if nothing is set

      • enableCurrentProgram

        public static boolean enableCurrentProgram()
        Enable the currently set shader program. This is effectively the same as GLProgram.getCurrentProgram().enable() but with a null check in case the value has not been set.
        Returns:
        true if current program exists and was enabled, false otherwise

      • disableCurrentProgram

        public static boolean disableCurrentProgram()
        Disable the currently set shader program. This is effectively the same as GLProgram.getCurrentProgram().disable() but with a null check in case the value has not been set.
        Returns:
        true if current program exists and was disabled, false otherwise

      • getDefaultProgram

        public static GLProgram getDefaultProgram()
        Get the default shader program provided by the Snap2D OpenGL API.
        Returns:
        the default shader program, or null if not set (compat mode)

      • enableDefaultProgram

        public static boolean enableDefaultProgram()
        Enable the default shader program. This is effectively the same as GLProgram.getDefaultProgram().enable() but with a null check in case the value has not been set.
        Returns:
        true if default program exists and was enabled, false otherwise

      • disableDefaultProgram

        public static boolean disableDefaultProgram()
        Disable the default shader program. This is effectively the same as GLProgram.getDefaultProgram().disable() but with a null check in case the value has not been set.
        Returns:
        true if default program exists and was disabled, false otherwise

      • isDefaultProgEnabled

        public static boolean isDefaultProgEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the default program is enabled, false otherwise

      • attachShader

        public void attachShader(GLShader shader)

      • detachShader

        public void detachShader(GLShader shader)

      • link

        public boolean link()

      • printLinkLog

        public void printLinkLog()

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Enable the shader program for use in subsequent pipeline calls.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disable the shader program. When the shader program is disabled, the library default program will be automatically re-enabled.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()

      • getProgramObject

        public int getProgramObject()

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation(String uniform)
        Fetches the internal OpenGL location for the given uniform.
        Parameters:
        uniform -
        Returns:
        the uniform location, or -1 if not found
